thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 20 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-MeVis Medical Solutions Q1 Profit After Tax At EUR 1.5 Million​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-MeVis Medical Solutions Q1 Profit After Tax At EUR 1.5 Million​
text:
Feb 20 (Reuters) - MEVIS MEDICAL SOLUTIONS AG:
* DGAP-NEWS: MEVIS MEDICAL SOLUTIONS AG: MEVIS PUBLISHES FIGURES FOR THE FIRST QUARTER OF FISCAL YEAR 2017/2018
* Q1 ‍REVENUES AT EUR 4.3 MILLION 23 % BELOW PREVIOUS YEAR‘S LEVEL​
* ‍Q1 EBIT OF EUR 2.0 MILLION (COMPARED TO EUR 2.9 MILLION IN PREVIOUS YEAR)​
* ‍Q1 PROFIT AFTER TAX OF EUR 1.5 MILLION (COMPARED TO EUR 4.4 MILLION IN PREVIOUS YEAR)​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
